definition: محق muḥiqq telling the truth, in the right, being right محق maḥaqa a (maḥq) to efface, blot out, strike out, erase (هـ s.th.); to eradicate, exterminate, annihilate, destroy (هـ s.th.) IV to wane, become invisible (moon); to 894 perish V, VII (انمحق or امحق immaḥaqa) and VIII to be or become effaced; to be annihilated, be destroyed, perish محق maḥq effacement, obliteration; eradication, extermination, annihilation, destruction
